How to add a blogpost

  1. Checkout the repo and make a new branch.
  2. Copy /internal/_posts/YEAR-MO-DA-blog-template.md to a new file under /internal/_posts with the appropriate title.
  3. Write your blog post in markdown syntax.
  4. Commit and push to your branch and open a pull request to the git repo.
